name: Neon Speed Rush
description:
Neon Speed Rush is a thrilling casual game in which you tap to switch lanes, as you try to dodge the obstacles in a colorful labyrinth and win the high score!

With an endless collection of stages and collectible gems that will let you customize your experience, this particular runner is one you won't put down any time soon.

Can you tap to the top of the leaderboards and earn your bragging rights? Play this game from Tap Tap Games by Huuuge now to find out!
